Kodi mungafune kuletsa kulumikizana kwa VPN komwe kulipo? INDE AYI Inde Ayi Sankhani Zithunzi Ma tabu Gawani Sungani Zambiri Chabwino Letsani Sinthani tsamba losakhazikika lomwe limakhala pa
kuyamba kwa Browser Onjezani ulalo wofufuzira mwamakonda kusankhanso "Custom\search engine" ngati kusaka Sankhani makina osakira omwe mumakonda kapena\ikani yamakonda Chotsani zidziwitso za msakatuli wanu kapena sankhani zomwe zidzachotsedwe mukachoka pa pulogalamuyi Sankhani zigawo za msakatuli\zimene zidzayambike Sinthani machitidwe ndi mawonekedwe a pulogalamuyi kuti
 zigwirizane ndi zomwe mumakonda Kuti muwonetse zokambirana za fyuluta kwanthawi yayitali dinani chizindikiro cha bookmark pachiwonetsero. Sankhani zomwe mungagwiritse ntchito Zokonda pa msakatuli, komwe mungathe kutengera\mtundu wanu wa android kukupatsani chilolezo. Yambitsani zithunzi za Netiweki, Kuyimitsa kungakhale kothandiza\kusunga data ya m'manja ndikutsegula tsamba mwachangu Lolani masamba kuti apeze komwe muli. Ena
mawebusayiti a {google, map for nav) amafunikira izi Sungani mbiri yamawebusayiti omwe mwachezera Yambitsani JavaScript. Mawebusayiti ambiri amafunikira
JavaScript kuti agwire ntchito. Koma amapumulanso ndipo atha kugwiritsidwa ntchito poukira Yambitsani Ma cookie. Ma cookie ndi mafayilo ang'onoang'ono, zomwe zasungidwa pa chipangizo chanu. Mawebusayiti amagwiritsa ntchito iwo mwachitsanzo kusunga makonda a ogwiritsa ntchito. Koma Atha kugwiritsidwanso ntchito kusonkhanitsa anthu omwe amawagwiritsa ntchito deta. Ma cookie a chipani chachitatu amazimitsa nthawi zonse. Nkhani yotsimikizira pamene\kutseka msakatuli Nkhani yotsimikizira potseka tabu Tsegulaninso tabu yatsopano pomwe tabu yomaliza yatsekedwa m'malo motuluka msakatuli Gwiritsani ntchito zenera lonse posakatula patsamba mukadina batani lakumbuyo mudzasiya mawonekedwe onse Zithunzi Makanema Web Browser Image Slider Ena Zam'mbuyo Thandizeni Zokonda Zinenero Mapulogalamu Ena Tivotereni Screen Mirroring Onetsetsani kuti foni yanu ndi TV zilumikizidwa pa netiweki yomweyo ya Wi-Fi. Wi-Fi Yolumikizidwa Wi-Fi Yachotsedwa General Lankhulani Tumizani Ndemanga Maphunziro Kodi ntchito? Kukhamukira Ubwino Wotsatsira Auto Imani Chepetsani Auto Patsogolo Njira Yoyang'anira Imitsani kanema pamene kulumikiza
di chandamale kwatayika Bisani pulogalamu pamene galasi akuyamba Kuyang'ana pakuponya Mirroring mode Screen mirroring mfundo zachinsinsi mfundo Zazinsinsi Zida zothandizira Onani ndi zida ziti zomwe zimathandizira kuwonetsera Mutu wamtundu Chakuda Kuwala Zadzidzidzi Sankhani Chiyankhulo pafupi Zithunzi za Slider Screen Mirror Chipangizo chanu chomwe mukufuna kuchifuna chikuyenera kukhala pamanetiweki a Wi-Fi ngati chipangizochi, chifukwa Screen Mirror imatumiza zenera lanu. Tsitsani chophimba cha chipangizo chanu pa Wi-Fi kupita pakompyuta yanu, kope kapena piritsi. Mutha kugwiritsanso ntchito hotspot ya chipangizo chanu (njira yolumikizira) ndikulumikiza chipangizo chanu ku hotspot yanu. Tsegulani malo pa chipangizo chanu chandamale. Ndi kupanga sikani QR code kasinthidwe kugwirizana imafalitsidwa ndi mirroring akuyamba. Chonde dziwani kuti Screen Mirror imagwira ntchito pokhapokha ikakhazikitsidwa bwino. Screen Mirror imatumiza chinsalu chanu, koma osati ma audio a chipangizo chanu. Ngati mukukumana ndi mavuto tiuzeni. Sangalalani ndi makanema osalala komanso apamwamba kwambiri
opanda kuchedwa Lumikizani ndi chipangizo chilichonse chanzeru ndipo sangalalani ndi
kuwonetsa pa sikirini iliyonse Sangalalani ndi msakatuli wachinsinsi wa mkati mwa pulogalamu popanda malire Kukhazikitsa Screen Hotspot ya Chipangizo Scan kodi Thandizo Malizitsani Ndondomeko Zathu Kuteteza zinsinsi zanu ndikofunikira kwa ife. Tikukhulupirira kuti mawu otsatirawa akuthandizani kumvetsetsa momwe timachitira ndi zinthu zomwe zimadziwika kuti ndinu ndani, mutha kutipatsa nthawi zina kudzera pa intaneti (pulatifomu ya Google Play).

Kawirikawiri. sititenga PII iliyonse kuchokera kwa inu mukatsitsa mapulogalamu athu a Android. Kunena zachindunji, sitifuna kuti ogula azichezera pulogalamu yathu, tilibe ngakhale Seva yoti tisunge PII yotere.

Screen Mirroring imagwiritsa ntchito Facebook ngati otsatsa malonda. Facebook ikufuna kuwonetsa zotsatsa zomwe zili zofunika kwa inu. Kuti mudziwe zambiri, chonde pitani
https://m.facebook.com/ads/ad_choices.

Mmene tingakupezeni PII ndi pamene inuyo mwasankha kutitumizira maimelo anu kapena kutipatsa cholakwika. lipoti. PII yomwe titha kulandira kuchokera kwa inu mukakhala ngati imeneyi ndi dzina lanu, adilesi ya imelo ndi mayankho anu pa kafukufukuyu okha.

Zimenezi zili pamwambazi, tikukutsimikizirani kuti inu PII idzagwiritsidwa ntchito polumikizana nanu komanso kukonza ntchito zathu. Sitidzagwiritsa ntchito zinthu zotere (monga dzina lanu ndi imelo adilesi_ pazifukwa zina zilizonse, monga kutsatsa malonda athu, kapena kuulula zambiri zanu kwa munthu wina kuti tipindule nazo.

Ziyenera kuzindikirika kuti kaya kapena kuti tisatitumizire ndemanga zanu kapena lipoti la cholakwika ndimwadzifunira mwakufuna kwanu.Ngati muli ndi nkhawa kuti PII yanu ikugwiritsiridwa ntchito molakwika, kapena ngati mukufuna kudziwa zambiri zachinsinsi chathu ndi tanthauzo lake, chonde omasuka kutitumizira imelo. pa screenmirroring.feedback@gmail.com, tidzayesetsa kupereka mayankho omveka bwino a mafunso anu munthawi yake. Chonde lembani ndemanga zanu System Info yanu idzatumizidwa ku Screen Mirroring tech Department Tumizani kupereka ndemanga Imelo yolakwika yaperekedwa Yang'anani kulumikizidwa kwanu pa intaneti lembani apaâ€¦ Lowetsani imelo yanu (posankha) Kusangalala ndi App? Vomerezani zomwe mwakumana nazo pogwiritsa ntchito Screen
Mirroring App. Osati pano Ndemanga: Chitsanzo: Mtundu: Mtundu wa OS: Wopanga: RAM: Tumizani makalata Sankhani Chithunzi Malo Othandizira Foni yanga imakakamira pa "Kulumikizana" polumikizana ndi TV. Zinandigwirira ntchito kale, koma sizikugwira ntchito tsopano. Zikuwonetsa kuti chipangizo changa sichimathandizidwa. TV yanga ndi TV yakale ndipo 
sigwirizana ndi Wi-Fi. Chithunzi pa TV ndi chakuda, koma phokoso limatha kumveka. Kulumikizana kudzasokonezedwa 
pakapita nthawi. Kodi zambiri zanga kapena foni yam'manja ndi yotetezeka? Yambitsaninso Wi-Fi ya foni yanzeru ndikuwona ngati kulumikizana kwabwino. Zimitsani TV ndikuchotsanso chingwe chake chamagetsi pasoketi. Dikirani mphindi imodzi ndikuyambitsanso TV. Kufupikitsa mtunda pakati pa foni yanu ndi TV. Itengereni pafupi. Ngati idagwira ntchito kale, ndiye kuti itha kugwiritsidwanso ntchito. Mavuto ambiri olumikizira amatha kuthetsedwa poyambitsanso zida. Ingoyambitsaninso foni yanu ndi TV, tsatirani njira yolumikizira nthawi zonse kuti muyesenso. Izi zikutanthauza kuti foni yanu palokha siligwirizana chophimba mirroring ntchito. Mutha kugwiritsa ntchito XCast kuponya makanema, zomvera ndi zithunzi pa TV. Ndi XCast, mutha kuchita zinthu zina ndi foni yanu mukamatumizira TV. Ngati TV yanu imathandizira mawonekedwe a HDMI, tikupangira kuti mugule cholandirira chakunja cha galasi lowonera. Monga Chromecast, Anycast etc. Zina zimaphatikizapo kutetezedwa kwa kukopera ndipo sizingawonekere pazida za anthu ena, monga Netflix, Disney Plus etc. Mukhoza kukopera kanema kapena kuyang'ana gwero yemweyo pa mapulogalamu ena kuti tiyese. Mutha kuyatsa Smart Connect muzokonda zanu za Wi-Fi. Idzasaka maulalo abwino a Wi-Fi pafupipafupi, ndikulumikizana uku ndi uku. Chonde onetsetsani kuti Wi-Fi ya foni yam'manja ndi TV ndi SAM komanso chizindikiro chabwino kwambiri. Sitidzayang'anira kapena kusonkhanitsa zambiri za inu ndi foni yanu yam'manja. Mutha kuyika skrini yanu popanda nkhawa. Dongosolo angakuchenjezeni kuti pali ngozi ngozi pamaso chophimba galasi. Ichi ndi chikumbutso chokhazikika, chidzakhala WIFI MIRA CAST AYIKANI Ikani Pamanja Onetsetsani kuti foni yanu ndi TV zilumikizidwa\pa netiweki yomweyo ya Wi-Fi. data bases" Mukayatsidwa, ma cookie onse achotsedwa. Komanso\Ma Cookies amasamba odalirika Chotsani nkhokwe Chotsani Ma cookie Chotsani pulogalamu ikatuluka Nthawi zonse mukasiya zonse zomwe zasungidwa pamwambapa\zichotsedwa Chithunzi JavaScript Ma cookie Tsegulaninso tabu yomaliza Tsimikizani tabu kutseka Tsimikizirani kutuluka kwa msakatuli Udindo Chida choyamba Bisani chida Zida Zosungira Sinthani Lero Ola lotsiriza Sabata yatha Mwezi watha Chotsani mbiri yonse kukopera Gawani SS Woyang'anira Fayilo Sakani Onjezani Njira Yachidule Kutuluka kwa Tabu Kodi mukufuna kutseka Kutsitsa kwatha.
